title: Two Storied House for Sale in Piliyandala.
details: Solidly Built Two Storied House for Sale in Piliyandala, built on 10 Perches Land & approx 2,500 Sq Feet floor area.The house used all the highest quality materials to build, brick walls, Jack or Teak timber, Rochelle and Lanka tiles, Granite bench tops, Mahogany pantry cupboards.
